import { Row, Col, Rate } from "antd" import { MyService } from "../services/myService" const ProductComp = ({productDetail}) => { return (

{productDetail.name}

By Truc Nguyen
50 Reviews

{productDetail.sale ? Sale : null}

{MyService.dotsNumber(productDetail.price)}


{MyService.dotsNumber(productDetail.price+parseInt(productDetail.sale))}
) } export default ProductComp
